result.eng: They were kissing in broad daylight.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoil

result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag pógaḋ a ċéile os coṁair an tsaoilThey were kissing in broad daylight.

result.ga: Do lucht féachana os cionn 18 bliain

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.eng: She heard the screeching of the seagulls above the grey streets.
result.ga: Chuala sí scréachaíl na bhfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liatha
result.orig: Chuala sí scréachaíl na bhfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liatha

result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí scréaċaíl na ḃfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liaṫaShe heard the screeching of the seagulls above the grey streets.

result.eng: We a have a lot ahead of us.
